languages.text: While Jae is fighting with weapons in both hands, the attack from the second hand (depending on which hand she attacked with first in the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}) does not cost any additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда Джай сражается, держа по оружию в каждой руке, атака, совершаемая второй рукой (в порядке очередности в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}), не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

traits.locale_text: While Jae is fighting with weapons in both hands, the attack from the second hand (depending on which hand she attacked with first in the round) do not cost any additional AP.

While Jae is fighting with weapons in both hands, the attack from the second hand (depending on which hand she attacked with first in the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}) does not cost any additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда Джай сражается, держа по оружию в каждой руке, атака, совершаемая второй рукой (в порядке очередности в этом раунде), не требует затрат ОД.
Когда Джай сражается, держа по оружию в каждой руке, атака, совершаемая второй рукой (в порядке очередности в этом раунде), не требует затрат ОД.

languages.text: 当婕伊双持武器战斗时，她的副手攻击（哪只手是副手，取决于她在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次攻击的那只手）不再额外消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: While Jae is fighting with weapons in both hands, the attack from the second hand (depending on which hand she attacked with first in the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}) does not cost any additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当婕伊双持武器战斗时，她的副手攻击（哪只手是副手，取决于她在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次攻击的那只手）不再额外消耗{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: ジェイが両手に武器を持って戦っている間、（その{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}でどちらの手で先に攻撃したかによって）2番目の手からの攻撃は追加の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費しない。
languages.original_text: While Jae is fighting with weapons in both hands, the attack from the second hand (depending on which hand she attacked with first in the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}) does not cost any additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ジェイが両手に武器を持って戦っている間、（その{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}でどちらの手で先に攻撃したかによって）2番目の手からの攻撃は追加の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費しない。

languages.text: Si Jae lucha con un arma en cada mano, el ataque de la segunda mano (dependiendo de con qué mano atacó primero en el mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}) no le cuesta {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} adicionales.
languages.original_text: While Jae is fighting with weapons in both hands, the attack from the second hand (depending on which hand she attacked with first in the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}) does not cost any additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si Jae lucha con un arma en cada mano, el ataque de la segunda mano (dependiendo de con qué mano atacó primero en la misma {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}) no le cuesta {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} adicional.

languages.text: Wenn Jae mit Waffen in beiden Händen kämpft, kostet der Angriff mit der zweiten Hand (je nachdem, mit welcher Hand sie in der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} zuerst angegriffen hat) keine zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: While Jae is fighting with weapons in both hands, the attack from the second hand (depending on which hand she attacked with first in the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}) does not cost any additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn Jae mit Waffen in beiden Händen kämpft, kostet der Angriff mit der zweiten Hand (je nachdem, mit welcher Hand sie in der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} zuerst angegriffen hat) keine zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque Jae se bat avec une arme dans chaque main, l'attaque de la seconde main (selon la main avec laquelle elle a attaqué en premier lors du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}) ne coûte pas de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: While Jae is fighting with weapons in both hands, the attack from the second hand (depending on which hand she attacked with first in the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}) does not cost any additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque Jae se bat avec une arme dans chaque main, l'attaque de la seconde main (selon la main avec laquelle elle a attaqué en premier lors du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}) ne coûte pas de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} supplémentaires.

languages.text: Jae iki elinde de silahla savaşırken ({g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk olarak hangi eliyle saldırdığına bağlı olarak) ikinci elle yaptığı saldırı, ilave {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcamaz.
languages.original_text: While Jae is fighting with weapons in both hands, the attack from the second hand (depending on which hand she attacked with first in the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}) does not cost any additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
